metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43750 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/usb/mon/mon_bin.c in usbmon in the Linux kernel before 5.19.15 and6.x before 6.0.1 allows a user-space client to corrupt the monitor'sinternal memory.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
